directions: Mix tomatoes, cucumber, red bell pepper, onion, parsley, lime juice, olive oil, green onions, cilantro, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Let stand at room temperature until flavors combine, about 3 hours.
ingredients: 1/2 English cucumber, quartered and thinly sliced
1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Vinagrete (Brazilian Tomato Slaw)
